parameters.name: elem
parameters.description: The element that will be popped up

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: an element used for positioning the popup, by default the viewport is used

parameters.name: xe
parameters.description: a value from 0 to 1, (0 being the rightmost side of the element/viewport and 1 being the leftmost side) that is matched up with the x value specified by xr

parameters.name: xr
parameters.description: a value from 0 to 1, (0 being the rightmost side of the element/viewport and 1 being the leftmost side) that is matched up with the x value specified by xe

parameters.name: ye
parameters.description: a value from 0 to 1, (0 being the topmost side of the element/viewport and 1 being the bottommost side) that is matched up with the y value specified by yr

parameters.name: yr
parameters.description: a value from 0 to 1, (0 being the topmost side of the element/viewport and 1 being the bottommost side) that is matched up with the y value specified by ye

parameters.name: dim
parameters.description: the opacity of the black background from 0â€“255

parameters.name: boxShadow
parameters.description: the value of the CSS box-shadow property of the popup

parameters.name: zIndex
parameters.description: the value of the CSS z-index property

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: a callback to be executed when the popup is closed via clicking outside of it

name: transWait
returns: a promise that resolves when elem emits a transitionend event
